original_query: SELECT MIN(ph.Id) FROM postHistory as ph, posts as p, users as u, badges as b WHERE b.UserId = u.Id AND p.OwnerUserId = u.Id AND ph.UserId = u.Id AND p.AnswerCount>=0 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-03 03:32:35' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-12 22:21:49' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 22:21:49'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E3.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E3.UserId=E4.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.AnswerCount >= 0 AND posts.FavoriteCount >= 0 AND posts.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-03 03:32:35'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E4E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E3E4.UserId=E2.OwnerUserId)
